name: The London Heist
summary: Be transported to London’s gritty criminal underworld and step into the shoes of an east end gangster. You will experience coming face to face with a psychotic gangland enforcer, pulling a heist on the Russian mob and, for the first time on PlayStation VR, surviving a high octane shoot out on the streets of London.  Become immersed in unique gameplay in a way you have never experienced before with two unique demo experiences from SCE London Studio.
